question: The tourism campaign of which state has won the prestigious PATA Grand award 2020?
explanation:
The globally acclaimed campaign of Kerala Tourism, ‘Human by Nature’ has bagged the prestigious PATA Grand Award 2020 for Marketing.
This year’s awards honoured the achievements of three Grand title winners and 21 Gold awards. Kerala bagged one among the three Grand title winners and the awards were announced during a virtual presentation ceremony in Beijing.
